mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.code AS "code", a.arrive_date AS "arriveDate", a.u8code AS "u8code", a.dept AS "dept.id", a.vendor AS "vendor.id", a.status AS "status", a.u8status AS "u8status", dept.name AS "dept.name", vendor.name AS "vendor.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office dept ON dept.id = a.dept LEFT JOIN base_vendor vendor ON vendor.id = a.vendor
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO business_arrivalvouch( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, code, arrive_date, u8code, dept, vendor, status, u8status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{code}, #{arriveDate}, #{u8code}, #{dept.id}, #{vendor.id}, #{status}, #{u8status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE business_arrivalvouch SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, code = #{code}, arrive_date = #{arriveDate}, u8code = #{u8code}, dept = #{dept.id}, vendor = #{vendor.id}, status = #{status}, u8status = #{u8status} WHERE id = #{id}
